solution_line_template: Find the total cost of the cappuccinos by multiplying the price by the quantity: {num_cappuccinos} cappuccinos x ${cost_per_cappuccino}/cappuccino = $<<{num_cappuccinos}*{cost_per_cappuccino}={total_cappuccino_cost}>>{total_cappuccino_cost}
Then do the same for the iced teas: {num_iced_teas} iced teas x ${cost_per_iced_tea}/tea = $<<{num_iced_teas}*{cost_per_iced_tea}={total_iced_tea_cost}>>{total_iced_tea_cost}
Then do the same for the cafe lattes: {num_cafe_lattes} lattes x ${cost_per_cafe_latte}/latte = $<<{num_cafe_lattes}*{cost_per_cafe_latte}={total_cafe_latte_cost}>>{total_cafe_latte_cost}
Then do the same for the espressos: {num_espressos} espressos x ${cost_per_espresso} = $<<{num_espressos}*{cost_per_espresso}={total_espresso_cost}>>{total_espresso_cost}
